Name: Artur
description:
Artur is 40 years old and he lives in Kapan city, Syunik region. Artur is divorced and he has three sons. His elder son lives with him now. Artur is a beekeeper with over 100 bee families and learned skills for their care from his father. He has great honey production and also a lot of regular customers for it.

Artur has a small market where he sells a great assortment of food and candy, products that have daily high demand. His market is clean and attractive, and he stocks everything neatly. A great assortment of products always attracts more and more customers to his market.

Artur needs this loan as he has decided to buy a new assortment of products for his market and also to buy new types of canned goods and candies as well.
